name: Train Maze
description: Train Maze is a fun puzzle game that challenges you to move carefully through a sequence of tricky obstacles on virtual train platforms.  This educational app for 5-12 year olds has been created by Sydney Trains to encourage safe behaviour at train stations and supports rail safety programs taught in primary schools across Sydney.  How to play:  Tap and release to move  Reach the goal in the fewest number of moves  Watch out for obstacles along the platforms   Make it to Level 7 to become a station safety superstar!
